Note.Content: {A:MT} {A:HOTTP}-C | {A:NJPS} "[the sons of] the father of" |{A:RSV} {A:NIV} {A:NRSV} {A:REB} {A:GNT} {A:CEV} "sons of" | {A:NJB} "Abi-Etam"

LEXSense.DefinitionShort: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= a person ► who is the founder of a village, town, or region, and usually the ancestor of most of its inhabitants
= a person ► who is the first to be engaged in a certain activity or pattern of behavior
= a person, ◄ compared to a father, ► who is the originator of a certain process; ≈ said about God only
= a person, ◄ compared to a father, ► who provides advice to someone in authority
= a person, ◄ compared to a father, ► who provides care for the people under his authority; ≈ often extended to refer to God
= a location, ◄ compared to a father, ≈ regarded as a source of security and comfort
= a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry; ◄ smallest unit within family group
= a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry; ◄ largest unit within family group
= a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry
= possessions belonging to a group of people that share a common ancestry
= way of addressing a male person that one regards as one's superior because of his age, status, authority, etc.
